name: Pixel Fighter
description:
Blow up asteroids, space turrets, and enemy craft in this fast-paced twin-stick style action arcade game!

Pixel Fighter is our attempt at building a framework for future top-down ship combat games and twin-stick shooters.  This micro-game includes 6 playable missions, each with one of 3 unique objective types.

When in doubt, go in guns blazing!  The mission objectives will work themselves out.
